description:
With three law offices in the greater Cleveland metro area and four more offices across Ohio and northern Kentucky, Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, offers convenient access to clients throughout our area who suffered a serious injury or loss as the result of any of the following:

  • Medical malpractice claims
  • Birth and delivery injuries
  • Vaccine injuries
  • Brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, construction accidents and other preventable tragedies

Widely regarded as one of the leading personal injury and medical malpractice law firms in our region, we have achieved remarkable success advocating on behalf of individuals and families in need. To date, we have secured tens of millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, and you can rely on us to deliver the highest level of representation possible to help improve your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve.

As a result of our success, we have earned memberships in the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums, and our attorneys have received designation as among the best trial lawyers in the country. Among our most notable accolades, our lawyers have received AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America, including the organization's Lawyer of the Year Award.

Perhaps more importantly, we have also received Superb client ratings on Avvo along with the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To receive a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, to set up an appointment. In an effort to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
